org.dacapo.harness

Class Benchmark

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dacapo.harness.Benchmark

  • public abstract class Benchmark
extends java.lang.Object
    Each DaCapo benchmark is represented by an instance of this abstract class. It defines the methods that the benchmark harness calls during the running of the benchmark.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Config config
      Parsed version of the configuration file for this benchmark
      protected int iteration
      Keep track of the number of times we have been iterated.
      protected java.lang.ClassLoader loader
      Classloader used to run the benchmark
      protected java.lang.reflect.Method method 
      protected java.io.File scratch
      The scratch directory

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Benchmark(Config config, java.io.File scratch)
      When an instance of a Benchmark is created, it is expected to prepare its scratch directory, unloading files from the jar file if required.
      Benchmark(Config config, java.io.File scratch, boolean silent)

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public final boolean run(Callback callback,
                         java.lang.String size)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Run a benchmark. This is final because individual benchmarks should not interfere with the flow of control.
        Parameters:
        callback - The user-specified timing callback
        size - The size (as given on the command line)
        timing - Is this the timing loop ? Affects how we call the callback.
        Returns:
        Whether the run was valid or not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Whatever exception the target application dies with

      • prepare

        protected void prepare()
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Perform pre-benchmark preparation. By default it unpacks the zip file data/name.zip into the scratch directory.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • prepare

        protected void prepare(java.lang.String size)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        One-off preparation performed once we know the benchmark size. By default, does nothing.
        Parameters:
        size - The size (as defined in the per-benchmark configuration file).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • preIteration

        public void preIteration(java.lang.String size)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Benchmark-specific per-iteration setup, outside the timing loop. Needs to take care of any *required* cleanup when the -preserve flag us used.
        Parameters:
        size - Size as specified by the "-s" command line flag
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • startIteration

        public final void startIteration()
        Per-iteration setup, inside the timing loop. Nothing comes between this and the call to 'iterate' - its purpose is to start collection of the input and output streams. stopIteration() should be its inverse.

      • augmentSystemProperties

        public void augmentSystemProperties(java.util.Properties systemProperties)
        Augments the system properties in case additional properties need to be in effect during the actual benchmark iteration.
        Parameters:
        systemProperties - the system properties that need to be augmented. (They may be modified freely.)

      • iterate

        public abstract void iterate(java.lang.String size)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        An actual iteration of the benchmark. This is what is timed.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments to the benchmark
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • stopIteration

        public final void stopIteration()
        Post-iteration tear-down, inside the timing loop. Restores standard output and error, and saves the digest of the iteration output. This is inside the timing loop so as not to process any output from the timing harness.

      • useBenchmarkClassLoader

        protected void useBenchmarkClassLoader()
        TODO

      • revertClassLoader

        protected void revertClassLoader()
        TODO

      • validate

        public boolean validate(java.lang.String size)
        Perform validation of output. By default process the conditions specified in the config file.
        Parameters:
        size - Size of the benchmark run.
        Returns:
        true if the output was correct

      • postIteration

        public void postIteration(java.lang.String size)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Per-iteration cleanup, outside the timing loop. By default it deletes the named output files.
        Parameters:
        size - Argument to the benchmark iteration.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • postIterationCleanup

        protected void postIterationCleanup(java.lang.String size)
        Perform post-iteration cleanup.
        Parameters:
        size -

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        Perform post-benchmark cleanup, deleting output files etc. By default it deletes a subdirectory of the scratch directory with the same name as the benchmark.

      • getURL

        public static java.net.URL getURL(java.lang.String fn)
        Translate a resource name into a URL.
        Parameters:
        fn -
        Returns:

      • fileInScratch

        public java.lang.String fileInScratch(java.lang.String name)
        Return a file name, relative to the specified scratch directory.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the file, relative to the top of the scratch directory
        Returns:
        The path name of the file

                                         java.io.File destination)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                         DacapoException
        Unpack a zip file resource into the specified directory. The directory structure of the zip archive is preserved.
        Parameters:

        destination -
        Throws:

        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        DacapoException
